full_text: METROPOLITAN CORRECTIONAL CENTER NEW YORK, NY OFFICIAL OUT COUNT DATE: 8-3-19 COUNT TIME: 10 AM FROM: (Staff Member Preparing Out Count) LOCATION: A+7. Conf. additional_notes: The document contains redactions in the 'FROM' and 'REG #' fields. The document is a form used for counting inmates at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.
